termsOfUsePage.title: Terms of Use of Response There

introduction.heading: 1. Introduction and acceptance of the terms
introduction.p2: The service is owned and operated by responds there, currently without address or formal registration of a company.
introduction.p3: By creating an account, accessing or using any part of the service, you agree to bind to these terms and our privacy policy.

serviceDescription.heading: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.p1: Response there is an online platform (Software as A Service - SaaS) that allows users to create, distribute, collect answers and analyze data through customizable forms, research and questionnaires.

userAccountsResponsibilities.heading: 3. Accounts and responsibilities of the user

privacyDataProtection.heading: 6. Privacy and data protection
privacyDataProtection.p1: Your privacy and privacy of your respondents are extremely important to us.
privacyDataProtection.p2: Regarding the data you collect from your respondents through your forms, you are the 'data controller' and we are the 'data processor'.

limitationOfLiability.heading: 7. Limitation of liability
limitationOfLiability.p1: The service is provided 'in the state where it is' and 'as available', without guarantees of any kind, expressed or implicit.
limitationOfLiability.p2: Under no circumstances, it will be responsible for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including, without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill or other intangible losses, resulting from your access or use, or inability to access or use the service.
